price: “Hoće!”, odgovori on, “bit ćete tad sigurno meni najbliži.”
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
